import React, { useState, useRef } from 'react'; import './reports.css'; import html2canvas from 'html2canvas'; import jsPDF from 'jspdf'; const Reports = () => { const [requestDate] = useState(new Date().toLocaleDateString()); const formRef = useRef(null); const handleFormSubmit = (e) => { e.preventDefault(); // Perform form submission logic here // Generate PDF with form details generatePDF(); }; const handleClear = () => { // Reset form fields if (formRef.current) { formRef.current.reset(); } }; const generatePDF = () => { // Capture form as an image html2canvas(formRef.current).then((canvas) => { const imgData = canvas.toDataURL('image/png'); // Initialize jsPDF const pdf = new jsPDF(); // Add the form image to the PDF pdf.addImage(imgData, 'PNG', 10, 10, 190, 250); // Save the PDF pdf.save('form.pdf'); }); }; return (

Reports

Generated Report

); }; export default Reports;
